text: WTJX-FM (93.1 MHz) is a non-commercial, educational radio station, serving as an NPR affiliate for the United States Virgin Islands. The station is licensed to Charlotte Amalie. The station is owned and operated by the Virgin Islands Public Broadcasting System, which also owns sister station WTJX-TV. ==External links== * Official Website * TJX-FM Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in the United States Virgin Islands Category:NPR member stations Category:Charlotte Amalie, U.S. Virgin Islands
title: WTJX-FM
